item.title: v3
item.description:
v3

"I'll never forget the first time the prototype for v3 came together and we saw end to end that instant real-time redesign ..it was months and months of just too many all-nighters and retweeking a lot of the core algorithms to get from a few seconds to 100 milliseconds to sub 10 milliseconds and yeah we're just ..we're tired this is literally sunrise after another all-nighter..

item.title: Float Between Heaven And Earth At The Hotel Hubertus - Design Milk
item.description:
Float Between Heaven And Earth At The Hotel Hubertus - Design Milk

Head inland and take a swim at the Hotel Hubertus, a modern hotel nestled at the the foot of the Kronplatz in the Puster Valley of Valdaora, Italy.

item.title: Ray Oranges - Illustrator
item.description:
Ray Oranges - Illustrator

Finely Crafted design and image-making since 2009.

item.title: Artist Uses Up To 20,000 Screws To Create Impressive Portraits, Absolutely Nails Them
item.description:
Artist Uses Up To 20,000 Screws To Create Impressive Portraits, Absolutely Nails Them

Half painting, half sculpture, a study of balance, chaos and harmony. This is Descent, artist Bruce Mackley's stunning piece, an industrial mosaic of over 20,000 decking and framing screws set meticulously into painted pine board at varying depths.
